name.description: Identifier used to refer to the material.

parent.description: The material which this material should inherit default values from.

normalMap.description: A material whose texture should be used as this material's normal map. Setting this to `null` will remove the normal map inherited from the parent.

displacementMap.description: A material whose texture should be used as this material's displacement map. Setting this to `null` will remove the displacement map inherited from the parent.

roughnessMap.description: A material whose texture should be used as this material's roughness map. Setting this to `null` will remove the roughness map inherited from the parent.

ambientOcclusionMap.description: A material whose texture should be used as this material's ambient occlusion map. Setting this to `null` will remove the occlusion map inherited from the parent.

flowMap.description: A material whose texture should be used as this material's flow map. Setting this to `null` will remove the flow map inherited from the parent.

vanillaTextureIndex.description: If specified, the material will override the given vanilla texture ID.

hasTransparency.description: Indicates whether the texture includes transparency.

overrideBaseColor.description: Whether the material's color texture should override the colors of the underlying model.

unlit.description: Whether 117 HD should skip lighting the material, largely preserving the vanilla look.

brightness.description: A brightness multiplier for the material's color.

displacementScale.description: Specifies the maximum displacement height of the displacement map. Defaults to 0.1, i.e. one tenth of a tile.

flowMapStrength.description: Specifies how strongly the flow map should affect UVs. Defaults to 0.

flowMapDuration.description: The duration in seconds, per UV direction, before the flow map scrolling repeats. Defaults to [ 0, 0 ].

specularStrength.description: The strength of specular reflections. Defaults to 0. Should ideally be between 0 and 1.

specularGloss.description: The gloss of specular reflections. Defaults to 0. Commonly ranges from 10 to 500.

scrollSpeed.description: The duration in seconds, per UV direction, before texture scrolling repeats. Defaults to [ 0, 0 ], which disables scrolling.

textureScale.description: Scaling factors to apply along each direction. Factors below 1 shrink the texture. The third factor affects the normal map's strength. Defaults to [ 1, 1, 1 ].

materialsToReplace.description: A list of materials which this texture should override whenever the `replacementCondition` is true.

replacementCondition.description:
One or more boolean expressions. If any of them evaluate to true, the replacements are applied.
Supported operators: !, %, *, /, +, -, <, <=, >, >=, !=, ==, &&, ||, ?.
Supported variables: `modelTextures`, `groundTextures`, `blending`, `hdInfernalCape`, `season`, `SeasonalTheme.*`.
